name: SAVE THE DISK
description:
A windows 95 based good old (new) game with friends betrayals and THANUS...

FEATURES - 
  • Smooooooooth Animations
  • You meet Thanus and you play on Windows 95
  • All assets (except SFX ,Music and fonts) were made by me.
  • 5 Different Mobs but you dont need to fight em all.
  • Inspired by a true story.
  • Funny PUNNY Game Play.
  • Story Based
  • WEB SUPPORT! (but it is not to good i recommend downloading).
CONTROLS -

Mouse to move the cursor (Seriously WHY do you need to read this)

Arrow keys for moving around.

Left click to click (WHOLE DIFFERENT LEVEL)

CREDITS - 

Music by Twin Musicom - Mega Rust 

Font  by Font Space.

SFX from OpenGameArts.

Easter Eggs-3 3 Easter egg's in total when you find a Easter egg Dm me on Discord or make a ticket on the server to claim your PRIZE

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Join my Discord Server. Follow my itch.io page. Made in Godot
